thread.section_title: Truecar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Truecar | truecar.com
thread.title: Tanesha

author: Tanesha
title: Tanesha
text: TrueCar buying experience was okay. I'm not sure if I'm suppose to talk about the dealership (Carlotz Greensboro) or what, but when i first got there no one was there to greet me. They seen me walk in and that was it. So i almost walked about, but i really wanted to check out the car. After that it was friendly. It was a little speedy, but maybe it was due to the time i got there. Only advice i give to any car buyers get a diagnostic before purchasing the vehicle to ensure you're getting a good deal. Make time out for that. TrueCar buying services was fine i did get the price / lower that they advertised. I would recommend TrueCar nothing was hidden.
